title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing Ok after setting the classpath and output location, the software displays the error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This occurs because setting the output location and classpath are handled as separate operations, causing an illegal state to be created.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software.
2. Set the classpath.
3. Set the output location.
4. Press Ok and observe the error message mentioned above.
